                                                                           =
                                         : : Sting : :

                   =
                    Sting whips out a black energon baseball-bat like weapo=
n.  He smacks a Maximal across the head, actually knocking the head off.

 =
                                                                           =
             Sting:  Let's get the hell out of here!

                     =
                       He makes sure no Maximals can see him, and then he s=
neaks his way onto the ship, and waits for the others.
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thur=
sday, August 15, 2002 12:19 AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diese=
l : :

  He points a ship out in the distance.

  Diesel: I suggest that on=
e. It's a military ship. Shields, weapons, everything we'll need. The other=
s all seem to be science ships.

  Diesel pulled is sword from subspace. It=
 began to glow a crimson red and energy was emitted from it. Diesel was rev=
ealed as one of the few "laser rod" fighters.

  Diesel: Let's go!

  He ru=
ns at the shuttle he had pointed out.

  Diesel does not get far before abo=
ut twenty Maximals appear, all with plasma weapons. Diesel dives behind a s=
cience ship as plasma charges strike his former position.

  The Maximals w=
ait for smoke to clear, unsure if they had taken down their target. They ha=
dn't. Diesel leaps at them his blade glowing, and slashes. Two Maximals bod=
ies fall limp, their decapitated heads rolling at Diesel's feet.

  Diesel:=
 You guys wanna get involved here or what?

  He is brought back to battle =
as two more shots bounce off his blade.

  Diesel: The hell with this!

  F=
rom Diesel's shoulders come two rockets, which hit a hanger, causeing it to=
 collaps on a group of Maximals standing outfront it...
    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    S=
ent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 11:05 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages

=

                                                                          =
                                             : : Sting : :

               =
                                                             Sting drives i=
n and comes to a halt next to Diesel.  He transforms to robot mode.

      =
                                                                           =
         Sting:  They're all quite nice.  What do you guys think?
      ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 10:32 PM
      Subject: R=
e: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

      Diesel pulled up alongside=
 Arrow and transformed to his robot mode.

      Diesel: Ok, pick a ship, a=
nd lets get to the killing!
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        F=
rom: Hollywood Narrator 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: =
Wednesday, August 14, 2002 9:17 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


 =
       Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot. He transfor=
ms to robot mode.

        Arrow: This is my grand opportunity. I made an e=
xplosive exit last time...

          ----- Original Message -----
        =
  From: LurkerAbyss
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: We=
dnesday, August 14, 2002 8:17 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


 =
                                                                           =
                                                : : Sting : :

            =
                                                                           =
                   Sting:  Alright, let's head out.

                      =
                                         He transforms into a scorpion vehi=
cle.  Basically, a scorpion on wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
    =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: RoboRick007 
      =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2=
002 2:10 PM
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            : : Dies=
el : :

            Diesel: Great, glad to have you with us.

            H=
e transformes back to truck mode.

            Diesel: Lets continue on our=
 way!

            He continues to drive on.
              ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
              From: LurkerAbyss 
              To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
      =
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                    =
                                                                           =
                : : Sting : :

                                            =
                                                          Sting smiles, and=
 nods, acknowledging the offer.

                                          =
                                                            Sting:  It woul=
d be a pleasure to aid you all.
                ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                From: RoboRick007 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 AM
          =
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                : : Diesel : :

      =
          Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Diesel had excepted Stin=
g, he was not a enemie.

                Diesel: I have a proposition for y=
ou, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through the Transwarp r=
ift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join us?

           =
     Diesel waited for a reply.
                  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                  From: LurkerAbyss 
                  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
                  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
  =
                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                            =
                                                                           =
                           : : Sting : :

                                 =
                                                                           =
  Sting nods and then smiles a bit.
                      
                =
                                                                           =
              Sting:  It's a pleasure to meet you all.

                   =
                                                                        He =
extends his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a handshake.
                  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: RoboRick007 
    =
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesd=
ay, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
                    Subject: Re: Secret Messag=
es


                    : : Diesel : :

                    Diesel transfo=
rms to his robot mode.

                    Diesel: I am Diesel.

         =
           He motions to the others.

                    Diesel: This is A=
rrow and Deemos.
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
                From: LurkerAbyss 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
                      Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
   =
                   Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                         =
                                                                           =
                           : : Sting : :

                                 =
                                                                        He =
walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

                                   =
                                                                        Sti=
ng:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are you?
                        ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                        From: RoboRick007 
                 =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesday, A=
ugust 13, 2002 10:53 PM
                        Subject: Re: Secret Message=
s


                        : : Diesel : :

                        The dar=
k tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops down infront of their co=
nvoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop.

                      =
  Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
                          ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                          From: LurkerAbyss 
    =
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                         =
 Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                          Subject:=
 Re: Secret Messages


                                                    =
                 : : Sting : :

                                           =
   A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending from the sky, up ahe=
ad, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits to s=
ee if they will see him and stop...
                            ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                            From: RoboRick007 
         =
                   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                            =
Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
                            Subject=
: Re: Secret Messages


                            : : Diesel : :

       =
                     Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their d=
estination.
                              ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                           From: Hollywood Narrator 
                      =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                              Sent: Tue=
sday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                              Subject: Re: Se=
cret Messages


                              Arrow transforms into a motor=
cycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destination. Deems =
transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

           =
                     ----- Original Message -----
                         =
       From: RoboRick007
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:2=
9 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


       =
                         : : Diesel : :

                                He=
 smiled at his friends excitment.

                                Diesel: =
Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bo=
ts doing it!

                                Diesel transformes to his fue=
l truck mode.

                                Diesel: Roll out!

         =
                       He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arro=
w to lead the way.
